title: Traders Send Stocks to Fresh Highs in Strong First Week of 2026
description: US equities extended their bullish early-January run on Friday to notch new closing records, as bets on economic growth coalesced with expectations that the Federal Reserve remains on track to cut rates further this year.
content: US equities extended their bullish early-January run on Friday to notch new closing records, as bets on economic growth coalesced with expectations that the Federal Reserve remains on track to cut rates further this year.
